Settings Privacy App Info Priority (RED) Priority (Blue)` Priority (Yellow) Priority (Green) PRIVACY POLICY 1. NoteDesk app which is currently not supporting Ads but might do in future. This service is provided by NoteDesk at no cost and is intended for use as it Is. 

 2. This page is used to inform users regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of personal information if anyone decides to use NoteDesk. 

 3. We want to assure our users here that NoteDesk doesn't collect any kind of personal information and doesn't have access to user's personal data preventing it from data breach of its users. NoteDesk also doesn't have access to user-created notes in the app. 

 4. It doesn't have access to any kind of images used during note creation and sharing. There're features in the app which might mislead the users for data breaching by us but we at NoteDesk takes full responsibility of this thing and assure you that we don't save any kind of your personal data or information in general. 1. As we informed above that we don't have access to user's personal data and information in general and we don't collect and save the same. But, for a better experience and for some functionalities of the application, we'll need some run-time permission on the user's device. We also might need some identifiable information that will be retained on user's device and will not be collected by us in any way. 

 2. We'll have the user's device information once he/she install the application as this information is required by us and Google Play Services to generate analytics and crash reports. 

 3.
